about.descrip: Hello! I'm Luca :) FullStack Developer, enthusiastic, with the ability to contribute new and innovative ideas. I have skills to develop modular programming projects. I also consider having the versatility necessary to work in a team and I am always willing to listen and learn from other people's points of view. I really want to grow professionally and achieve all my goals.
about.descrip2: Worked as a developer for about 3 years, mainly focusing on Frontend development, although I also have experience and perform well on the Backend with some technologies. My experience includes roles as a Full Stack developer, which has allowed me to improve both my technical skills and my interpersonal skills. I learned to be responsible and communicate effectively with clients, since all my jobs have been freelance. These experiences have taught me a lot about web and application development, REST services, API development, client-server architecture, protocols, among other important aspects.

hero.specs: As a developer, I like to bring new and innovative ideas to the team, always striving to improve my skills. I do well with back-end development, however I thrive with front-end development since it gives me the chance to explore my creativity.
